code: import React,{useState}from"react";import projects from"./projects.json";import"./projects.css";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Projects(){const[activeSlide,setActiveSlide]=useState(0);const{t}=useTranslation();const changeSlide=number=>{setActiveSlide(number);};const project=projects[activeSlide];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"projects",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"title",id:"projects",children:t("Principais projetos")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"projects-container",id:"projects-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{id:"project-title",children:project.nome}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"project-objective",children:project.objetivo}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{id:"project-stacks",children:Object.entries(project.stacks).map(_ref=>{let[key,value]=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:key}),": ",value]},key);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:project.link,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"project-link",children:t("Acesse o projeto aqui")})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navigation-button",children:projects.map((project,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"dot ".concat(activeSlide===index?"active":""),onClick:()=>changeSlide(index)},index))})]});}export default Projects;
